channel.title: Moparscape version 2 is causing a error
channel.description:
hey everyone this is for anyone thats using a whitescape server for somereason the new moparscape is causing this too happen: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2897 Fatal: Expected login Id 14 from client. ClientHandler: Client null disconnected.
i know its the new version because it dosnt do it with any other version newayz this will cause your server too crash after a short period of time due too your server memory getting garbaged up so please be warned until this is fixed you will have frequent server crashes
i dont know if this is only for the local host but proof that this is true is run a server and then use moparscape 2 too connect and u will get that error now try moparscape 1 or soulscape and u wont get that error

item.title: Moparscape version 2 is causing a error

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:1, topic:675”]hey everyone this is for anyone thats using a whitescape server for somereason the new moparscape is causing this too happen:
ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2897
Fatal: Expected login Id 14 from client.
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected.

i know its the new version because it dosnt do it with any other version newayz this will cause your server too crash after a short period of time due too your server memory getting garbaged up so please be warned until this is fixed you will have frequent server crashes

i dont know if this is only for the local host but proof that this is true is run a server and then use moparscape 2 too connect and u will get that error now try moparscape 1 or soulscape and u wont get that error[/quote]

I thought it just affected scape based mysql servers :eek:, anyway Ill try to fix it in the next few days
